metadata.title: COLORSFORU Custom Face Pajamas for Women Personalized Photo Spaghetti Strap Tops Shorts Set Casual Two Piece Sleepwear Funny Gift
features: 【Customization Step】Click "Customize Now" button and then upload your photo and our team of designers will crop out the background or anything that isn’t the face or object for you. Attention Tips: To ensure the highest quality print, please note that this product's highly recommended uploaded good resolution image.

【Material】Women's short pajama set is made of 95% polyester and 5% spandex. Cami top with adjustable spaghetti straps at back. Shorts with full elastic waist allow easy pull-on with a secure fit. Two-piece pajama set includes a cropped cami top and a matching pair of shorts for coordinated sleep style.

【Funny Gifts】Perfect gift choice for your girlfriend, wife, mother, sisters or friends on Birthday, mother's Day, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Wedding Night, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

【Meaningful】It is customized by your photos, which will make you happy and belonging. Whenever she puts on this set of bathing suit with a customized face, she can remember the one who gave the gift, as if you accompany him.
【Occasions】Bachelor party, pajama party,bridesmaid pajamas party, bedroom sleepwear, bathroom, boudoir, holiday and loungewear set, spa, vacation, pool, daily wear.
description: The Womens short pajamas allow you add your own face to show your love to your daughter, wife, mom and girfriends. It will be a perfect gift for mother's day, birthday, Christmas, Anniversary, etc.
Made of 95% polyester and 5% spandex, smooth fabric for soft and comfortable feeling.
Suitable for many occasions: swimming, beach, bathing, pool, water park, spa etc.
Garment Care: Hand wash with cold water. Do not use bleach. Do not tumble dry.
Please feel free to contact us if you have any question and customer service will get back to you in 24 hours .
